A lecturer is someone who gives lectures, particularly in an academic setting like a university. Lecturers can be found in virtually all academic fields, not just STEM subjects.

- Humanities (history, literature, philosophy)
- Social sciences (psychology, sociology, economics)
- Arts (music, fine arts, theater)
- Languages
- Law
- Medicine
- And yes, also in STEM fields (science, technology, engineering, mathematics)

So lecturers are not primarily involved in STEM fields - they are found across all academic disciplines. The profession of being a lecturer is not primarily STEM-focused.
